speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0033/2007 ) by Mrs Sartori, on behalf of the Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality, on the action plan for equality between men and women 2006 2010 ( 2006/2132 (INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0033/2007 ) by Mrs Sartori, on behalf of the Committee on Women’s Rights and Gender Equality, on the action plan for equality between men and women 2006 2010 ( 2006/2132 (INI) ).
